doc.title: Circular Panorama of Niagara Falls
doc.plot: Taken from Goat Island. Shows a panoramic view of the Rapids above the Horseshoe Falls, the entire Horseshoe, with the Canadian shore in the background. The camera then turns, looking down the Whirlpool below the Horseshoe Falls, showing the Suspension Bridge in the background; passes the American Falls, showing the Suspension Bridge in the background; passes the American Falls and ends by looking up the Rapids above the American Falls. This picture afford a complete view of Niagara Falls and the surrounding territory.
